incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved. Approval workflows have been re-triggered and a fix is implemented.

We are experiencing issues with approvals for attendances created from 14.12 ~20:45 CET until 15.12 10:40 CET not being shown. 

As a workaround you can edit these attendances and an approval will be recreated. We are working on a fix.

Attendance periods with a configured approval workflow that were created during this outage might not have approval requests as expected.

Attendance periods that were created during this outage with no approval workflow will be stuck in a non-approved state.
Engineers are working on a fix for this as well, but it'll take some more time. The incident started yesterday ~20:45 CET (Berlin timezone).

As a workaround you may update or re-create affected attendance periods.
The issue is identified, engineers are currently deploying a fix.

We are currently experiencing some issues with Attendance Approvals. New Attendance Approvals are not created. Old ones will still appear and can be approved/rejected as usual.

Please be aware that the remaining system is stable and running according to expectations. Our engineering teams are already working on a solution.

We will keep you posted with the latest information on this page and apologize for the inconveniences.

incident_updates.body:

Personio's is experiencing a partial outage of public and internal endpoints, resulting in some unstable behaviour of certain features.

components.name: Email services
components.description: Informationen zu E-Mail Services wie Erinnerungen, Benachrichtigungen sowie ein- und ausgehende Bewerbernachrichten. (Information about email services such as reminders, notifications as well as in- and outbound recruiting messages.)

incident_updates.body:
We see an overall recovery and all queued emails since 9:20 CEST are now being processed.

We expect all queued system emails to be delivered to users within a timely manner and the system to go back to normal soon.

Delayed outbound system emails

We have identified and were informed of an issue with our third-party email service provider.

This is causing Personio emails to be subject to huge delays. These emails include password reset requests, login security token emails, new account invitations, attendance related, absences related, recruiting emails and others.

Our third-party provider informed us, that the issue has been remediated and systems are beginning to process normally, but outbound mail is still delayed.

Delayed outbound system emails

We have identified and were informed of an issue with our third-party email service provider.

This is causing Personio emails to be subject to huge delays. These emails include password reset requests, login security token emails, new account invitations, attendance related, absences related, recruiting emails and others.

Currently, we do not have a clear ETA on resolution.

Authentication-related emails are mainly delayed

Our engineering team is still investigating the issue. We noticed that the outbound emails that are mainly affected are these related to Personio authentication (Password resets, security tokens, and new account invitations).

We still have not fully identified the root cause.

We are working on resolving this.

Partial service disruption with system emails

We are currently experiencing an issue with outbound emails. These emails include security tokens, password resets, invitation emails and others. 

Most of these emails are currently delayed and some others are not being received at all. We suspect that the issue started to happen around 9:00AM CEST.

We have not yet identified the root cause, we will keep you updated!

incidents.name: Partial service disruption: outdated data may be displayed

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We have applied all the necessary mitigations to avoid any further impact. We notice an overall improvement and stability throughout the system. Things look healthier than before, but still not fully stable to receive near realtime data. We are doing everything we can to get things back to normal, but it is a given fact that such issue takes time to resolve by itself at this stage.

We are currently closely monitoring the situation.

We are noticing an improvement in the state of the overall components after we applied the fixes. Things look healthier than before, but still not fully stable to receive near realtime data. These components will still might not be behaving as expected.

We are actively working on the situation and closely monitoring it.

We identified some commonly used components that are affected by this:

- System Reports and Custom Reports might be displaying outdated data
- New tasks not being shown
- Old (marked done) tasks showing again
- Receiving mails about newly requested Absences, which are not yet shown.

Please note that this is not a long-term issue, nor is any data lost. Other parts might also be affected, which are not listed here.

We are experiencing issues with different modules throughout Personio. These modules might be displaying outdated / stale data. The rest of the system is working as expected.

We identified the problem and we applied a fix to help resolve the issue. We are closely monitoring the state to ensure the system is stable again.

components.name: System availability
components.description: Informationen zur allgemeinen Systemverfügbarkeit wie Serverausfälle oder Performance Probleme. (Information about general system availability such as server outages or performance issues.)

incidents.name: Employee creation disrupted / Erstellen von Mitarbeiter-Profilen gestört

incident_updates.body:
The implemented fix is working as expected; the issue is fully resolved. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Thanks for your understanding!
---
Das System funktioniert wie gewünscht und das Problem ist vollständig behoben. Wir entschuldigen uns für eventuelle Unannehmlichkeiten und bedanken uns für das Verständnis!

The issue has been identified and was fixed immediately. Engineers are monitoring the system, but functionality is restored and employee creation works as expected. Some minor errors may happen - the team is monitoring those.
---
Die Ursache konnte identifiziert und umgehend behoben werden. Das System wird noch überwacht, die Funktionalität ist jedoch wiederhergestellt. Einzelne Fehler könnten auftreten - das Team beobachtet dies.

The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
---
Der Fehler wurde lokalisiert. Die Problembehebung ist eingeleitet.

We are currently experiencing some issues with the creation of Employee profiles. This is affecting Personio’s ability to handle employee creation workflows via:
- Employe List, 
- Public API, 
- Employee Wizard, etc.

When trying to add an employee via any workflow or API it first looks like the creation is processing and then stops. For the user this may look like they never clicked/started the workflow. This affects all parts of Personio where employees can be created.

Please be aware that the remaining system is stable and running according to expectations. Our engineering teams are already working on a solution.
 
We will keep you posted with the latest information on this page and apologize for the inconveniences.
_____________

Derzeit besteht eine Störung beim Erstellen von Mitarbeiter-Profilen. Dies betrifft die Workflows, die Mitarbeiterprofile erstellen, auch via:
- Mitarbeiterliste,
- API,
- Mitarbeiter-Anlegen Workflow, u.a.

Beim Versuch Mitarbeitende anzulegen, wirkt es zunächst als wäre der Prozess gestartet. Dieser stoppt jedoch und es wirkt auf Nutzende als hätte man nicht geklickt/wäre der Prozess nie gestartet worden. Dies betrifft alle Funktionen, welche ein Mitarbeiterprofil erstellen.

Bitte beachten Sie, dass das übrige System stabil ist und weiterhin genutzt werden kann. Unsere Entwickler*innen arbeiten bereits an einer Lösung.

Wir werden Sie auf dieser Seite fortlaufend über den neuesten Stand informieren und entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände.

incidents.name: Partial issues with Reminders / Problem mit Erinnerungen

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
---
Das Problem ist identifiziert; an einer Lösung wird bereits gearbeitet.

We are currently experiencing some partial problems with the Reminder function. Engineers identified the issue and are already working on a fix. Only a small subset of Reminders seems affected.

We will keep you posted with the latest information on this page and apologize for the inconveniences.
_____________

Derzeit kann es zu Problemen mit Erinnerungen kommen. Unsere Entwickler*innen arbeiten bereits an einer Lösung. Hiervon ist nur ein kleiner Teil von Erinnerungen betroffen.

Wir werden Sie auf dieser Seite fortlaufend über den neuesten Stand informieren und entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände.

incidents.name: Partial service disruption / Eingeschränkte Erreichbarkeit unseres Systems

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

We are currently experiencing some issues with the module Conversations. We localised degraded experience with Conversations.

Please be aware that the remaining system is stable and running according to expectations. Our engineering teams are already working on a solution.
 
We will keep you posted with the latest information on this page and apologize for the inconveniences.
-----
Wir haben aktuell ein Problem mit dem Modul Conversations. Seiten sind möglicherweise nicht erreichbar.

Bitte beachten Sie, dass das übrige System stabil ist und weiterhin genutzt werden kann. Unsere Entwickler*innen arbeiten bereits an einer Lösung.

Wir werden Sie auf dieser Seite fortlaufend über den neuesten Stand informieren und entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände.

incidents.name: Mobile app currently unavailable / Personio App derzeit nur eingeschränkt verfügbar

incident_updates.body:
This incident has been resolved. The mobile app is working as expected.
---
Der Vorfall ist gelöst. Die Personio Mobile App kann wie gewohnt verwendet werden.

We are currently experiencing some issues with the Personio Mobile App. Users may be unable to log in.

Please be aware that the remaining system is stable and running according to expectations. Our engineering teams are already working on a solution.
 
We will keep you posted with the latest information on this page and apologize for the inconveniences.
_____________

Die Personio App für iOS und Anroid ist derzeit nicht erreichbar. Nutzende können sich ggfs. nicht einloggen.

Bitte beachten Sie, dass das übrige System stabil ist und weiterhin genutzt werden kann. Unsere Entwickler*innen arbeiten bereits an einer Lösung.

Wir werden Sie auf dieser Seite fortlaufend über den neuesten Stand informieren und entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände.

incidents.name: Documents: Limited functionality / Dokumente: Eingeschränkte Funktionalität

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

A fix has been implemented. Engineers are monitoring the system.
---
Eine Fehlerbehebung wurde eingespielt. Das Systemverhalten wird beobachtet.

We are currently experiencing some issues with UX/UI within the Documents Tab (employee document list). The view of documents may be obstructed and functionality may be impacted. 

Please be aware that the remaining system is stable and running according to expectations. 
Our engineering teams are already working on a solution.
 
We will keep you posted with the latest information on this page and apologize for the inconveniences.
_____________

Derzeit besteht ein Problem mit der UI/UX im Bereich des Dokumente-Reiters (Anzeige der Mitarbeiterdokumenten-Kategorien). Die Dokumenten-Ansicht kann dadurch verhindert und in der Funktion eingeschränkt sein.

Das übrige System ist stabil und kann weiterhin genutzt werden. 
Unsere Entwickler*innen arbeiten bereits an einer Lösung.

Wir werden auf dieser Seite fortlaufend über den neuesten Stand informieren und entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände.

incidents.name: Partial service disruption / Eingeschränkte Erreichbarkeit unseres Systems

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are currently experiencing some issues with the module Marketplace. The following features are affected:
- Browsing through integrations
- Adding new integrations

Already set up integrations are not affected and are functioning. Please be aware that the remaining system is stable and running according to expectations. Our engineering teams are already working on a solution.
 
We will keep you posted with the latest information on this page and apologize for the inconveniences.
_____________

Wir haben aktuell ein Problem mit dem Modul Marketplace. Die folgenden Funktionalitäten sind davon betroffen:
- Integrationen betrachten
- Neue Integrationen hinzufügen

Bisher eingerichtete Integrationen sind nicht betroffen und funktionieren. Bitte beachten Sie, dass das übrige System stabil ist und weiterhin genutzt werden kann. Unsere Entwickler*innen arbeiten bereits an einer Lösung.

Wir werden Sie auf dieser Seite fortlaufend über den neuesten Stand informieren und entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände.

incidents.name: Partial performance / Loading time issues / Erhöhte Systemladezeiten

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are currently experiencing a partial performance issue for the "Export of Company Data" functionality, where some exports will complete and some won’t. Our engineering teams are already working on a solution.
 
We will keep you posted with the latest information and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
___________

Derzeit kommt es zu teilweise erhöhten Ladezeiten des Unternehmensdatenexports. Unsere Entwickler*innen arbeiten bereits an einer Lösung.

Wir informieren auf dieser Seite fortlaufend und entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände.

incidents.name: Partial service disruption / Eingeschränkte Erreichbarkeit unseres Systems

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are experiencing a partial outage in the absence module and in the employee information page.

Employee management, absence tracking and absence management areas might be very slow or not responsive. We are currently investigating the root cause.

Please be aware that the remaining system is stable and running according to expectations. Our engineering teams are already working on a solution.
 
We will keep you posted with the latest information on this page and apologize for the inconveniences.
_____________
Wir haben aktuell technische Schwierigkeiten im Modul Abwesenheiten und Mitarbeiterinformationen.

Die Seiten, Mitarbeiterinformationen und Abwesenheiten sind möglicherweise sehr langsam oder nicht ansprechbar. Wir untersuchen derzeit die Ursache des Problems.

Bitte beachten Sie, dass das übrige System stabil ist und weiterhin genutzt werden kann. Unsere Entwickler*innen arbeiten bereits an einer Lösung.

Wir werden Sie auf dieser Seite fortlaufend über den neuesten Stand informieren und entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände.

components.name: System availability
components.description: Informationen zur allgemeinen Systemverfügbarkeit wie Serverausfälle oder Performance Probleme. (Information about general system availability such as server outages or performance issues.)

incident_updates.body:
This incident has been resolved.

An issue with an internal security certificate caused Personio to degrade and become unavailable for customers between 08:00 and 12:30 CET on January 16th 2023. 
The issue related to the rejection of this certificate by the processes which automatically scale server capacity for Personio. The certificate is used to secure communication channels of technical components. 
No customer data is transferred via these channels and hence the confidentiality or integrity of the data was not impacted. This resulted in widespread outage occurring since the system could not scale to meet customer demand.
It took our engineering team several hours to investigate the reason why the certification was failing and put a fix in place.
A fix has been implemented; systems are back up and running. We are monitoring the situation.

The issue has been identified and the team is working on implementing a fix to ensure system stability. A quick fix has been implemented leading to the system being back up. A few components/modules might not be fully stable yet.

Our system is currently not available due to a global service outage. Our Engineers are already working to get everything up and running again.

We will keep you posted with the latest information and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
__________

Derzeit ist Personio nicht erreichbar. Unsere Entwickler*innen arbeiten bereits konzentriert an der Behebung der Störung.

Wir informieren auf dieser Seite fortlaufend über den neuesten Stand und entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Umstände.
